Status Channels

Status Channels lists channels that monitor the state and condition of various aspects of the custom device.

What do you want to do?

View status channel descriptions

To view a status channel description, select the status channel name in the configuration tree. The Status Channel Configuration page appears to the right of the configuration tree.

For more information about adding and configuring custom devices, refer to the Configuring and Running a Project book of the NI VeriStand Help, available by selecting Help»Search the NI VeriStand Help.
